affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
DURATION: 2 / 2 / 2 / 2
DAMAGE OVER TIME: 10 / 16 / 22 / 28
MOVE SLOW: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40%
ATTACK SLOW: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40%
cmb:
MANA COST: 20/20/20/20
COOLDOWN: 0
desc:
Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.
Poison Attack is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.
lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
name: viper_poison_attack

attrib:
BASE BONUS DAMAGE: 2.5 / 5 / 7.5 / 10
NON-HERO DAMAGE: 50% / 50% / 50% / 50%
MAX BONUS DAMAGE: 40 / 80 / 120 / 160
desc: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.   Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.
lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
name: viper_nethertoxin

attrib:
DURATION: 4
MOVE SLOW: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
ATTACK SLOW: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
MAGIC RESISTANCE: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
DAMAGE OVER TIME: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25
desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to spells.
notes:
Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
Corrosive Skin takes effect before enemy attacks are actually released.
lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
name: viper_corrosive_skin

SCEPTER MANA COST: 125 / 125 / 125

SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 900
cmb:
MANA COST: 125/175/250
COOLDOWN: 80/50/30
desc:
Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Slow works on magic immune units.
Units afflicted by Viper Strike can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
name: viper_viper_strike
